name: ‘Pumpkin’ Mousse Cheesecakes for Verrines
description: ‘Verrine’ comes from verre, the French word for glass. A Verrine is an impressive appetizer or dazzling dessert elegantly presented in a petit glass.
preparation: Place 1 tbsp crumbs in the bottom of 6 verrines. Set aside.
Beat cream cheese with 2 tsp brown sugar and Pumpkin Pie Spice.
Whip cream with remaining brown sugar in a separate bowl. Fold into cream cheese mixture. Divide between verrines.
Top with remaining crumbs and serve.
